modShortDescription: Now you can destroy microwaves in the 7 Days to Die and take home a working microwave. You can use bowls to combine canned foods for better meals.
modDescription:
Now you can destroy microwaves in the 7 Days to Die and take home a working microwave. Place your new microwave down and you can use bowls you find in loot to combine canned [foods](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-food/) for better meals.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/A19ModletsJax/tree/a19b168/JaxTeller718_WorkingMicrowave)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/JaxTeller718_Modlets_Stable/tree/master/JaxTeller718_WorkingMicrowave)** for A18

If you appreciate JaxTeller718â€™s work here feel free to use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.me/FrankCirabisiJr) to show support.

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19674-jaxteller718-a19-modlet-collection/).

**Credits:** [JaxTeller718](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/jaxteller718/)
